Vulnerability.Description: WordPress 2.5中的cookie认证方法依赖于包含USERNAME和EXPIRY_TIME的连接字符串的哈希，这允许远程攻击者通过注册导致相同连接字符串的用户名伪造cookie，如通过注册以"admin"开头的用户名来获取管理员权限所示，也称为"cryptographic splicing" 问题。注意：此漏洞之所以存在是因为对 CVE-2007-6013的修复不完整。

This issue appears to have been partially, but not completely fixed in WordPress 4.9

Vulnerability.Description: 在4.7.2之前的WordPress 4.7.x的REST API中,wp-includes/rest-api/endpoints/class-wp-rest-posts-controller.php中的register_routes函数不需要整数标识符,这使得远程攻击者 如wp-json/wp/v2/posts/123？id = 123helloworld URI所示,通过请求wp-json/wp/v2/posts以及一个数字值和一个非数字值来修改任意页面.

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2017/09/wordpress-4-8-2-security-and-maintenance-release/

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2017/09/wordpress-4-8-2-security-and-maintenance-release/

Vulnerability.Description: 在4.8.2版本之前，WordPress透过精心设计的模板名称在模板列表视图中允许跨站点脚本攻击。

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2017/09/wordpress-4-8-2-security-and-maintenance-release/

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2017/09/wordpress-4-8-2-security-and-maintenance-release/
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-14722: 在自行定義程序中發現了路徑走訪的漏洞
Vulnerability.Description: 在4.8.2版本之前，WordPress通过精心设计的主题文件名允许自行定义程序组件中的目录走访攻击。

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2017/09/wordpress-4-8-2-security-and-maintenance-release/
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-14723: $wpdb->prepare()會創建非預期和不安全的查詢，從而導致SQL注入攻擊
Vulnerability.Description: 在4.8.2版本之前, WordPress在$ wpdb-＆gt; prepare中错误处理了％字符和其他佔位符值，因此无法正确解决插件和主题产生SQL注入攻击的可能性。

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2017/09/wordpress-4-8-2-security-and-maintenance-release/
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-14724: 在oEmbed發現中發現了跨站點腳本（XSS）漏洞
Vulnerability.Description: 在4.8.2版本之前，WordPress容易受到oEmbed发现中的跨站脚本攻击。

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2017/09/wordpress-4-8-2-security-and-maintenance-release/
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-14725: 在使用者和術語編輯視窗發現了重新導向的問題
Vulnerability.Description: 在4.8.2版本之前，WordPress容易受到wp-admin / edit-tag-form.php和wp-admin / user-edit.php中开放的重新导向攻击。

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2017/09/wordpress-4-8-2-security-and-maintenance-release/
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-14726: 在可視化編輯器中發現了跨站點腳本（XSS）漏洞
Vulnerability.Description: 在4.8.2版本之前，WordPress很容易通过TinyMCE可视化编辑器中的短代码进行跨站点脚本攻击。

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/38474
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-14990: 存儲的明文wp_signups.activation_key值可能允許劫持未激活的用戶帳戶
Vulnerability.Description: WordPress 4.8.2 存储的明文wp_signups.activation_key值（但将类似的wp_users.user_activation_key值存储为杂凑值），这可能使远程攻击者更容易通过利用数据库读取访问权来劫持未激活的用户帐户（例如通过未指定的SQL注入漏洞获取的访问权限）。

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2017/10/wordpress-4-8-3-security-release/
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-16510: $wpdb->prepare()會創建非預期和不安全的查詢，從而導致SQL注入攻擊
Vulnerability.Description: WordPress 在 4.8.3 版本之前存在 $wpdb->prepare()会创建非预期和不安全的查询，从而导致SQL注入攻击 (SQLi) 在插件和主题中， 如 "双重准备" 方法所展示，不同于CVE-2017-14723的弱点。

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://codex.wordpress.org/Version_4.9.1
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-17091: wp-admin/user-new.php 允許遠程攻擊者繞過預期的訪問限制
Vulnerability.Description: wp-admin/user-new.php in WordPress 在 4.9.1 版本之前，将newbloguser键设置为可以直接从用户ID派生的字符串,当输入此字符串。允许远程攻击者绕过预期的访问限制

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://codex.wordpress.org/Version_4.9.1
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-17092: wp-includes/functions.php 允許遠程攻擊者進行XSS攻擊
Vulnerability.Description: wp-includes/functions.php in WordPress 在 4.9.1 版本之前不需要使用unfiltered_html功能上传.js文件，这可能允许远程攻击者通过精心制作的文件进行XSS攻击。

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://codex.wordpress.org/Version_4.9.1
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-17093: wp-includes/general-template.php 允許攻擊者進行XSS攻擊
Vulnerability.Description: wp-includes/general-template.php in WordPress在 4.9.1 版本之前没有正确限制HTML元素的lang属性，这可能允许攻击者通过站点的语言设置进行XSS攻击。

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://codex.wordpress.org/Version_4.9.1
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-17094: wp-includes/feed.php 允許攻擊者進行XSS攻擊
Vulnerability.Description: wp-includes/feed.php in WordPress 在 4.9.1 版本之前没有正确限制RSS和Atom字段中的附件，这可能允许攻击者通过精心设计的URL进行XSS攻击。

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2017/01/wordpress-4-7-1-security-and-maintenance-release/
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-5487: REST API公開了用戶數據,用於撰寫公開帖子類型的所有用戶
Vulnerability.Description: 在4.7.1之前的WordPress 4.7的REST API实现中,wp-includes/rest-api/endpoints/class-wp-rest-users-controller.php没有正确限制帖子作者的列表,这允许远端攻击者获取机密讯息通过wp-json/wp/v2/users请求.

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2017/01/wordpress-4-7-1-security-and-maintenance-release/
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-5488: 通過“update-core.php”上的插件名稱或版本標題,跨網站腳本（XSS）漏洞
Vulnerability.Description: 远端攻击者可以通过插件的（1）名称或（2）版本头部注入任意的web脚本或HTML,在wp-admin/update-core.php中的多个跨站点脚本（XSS）漏洞.

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2017/01/wordpress-4-7-1-security-and-maintenance-release/

Vulnerability.Description: 4.7.1之前的WordPress中的跨站请求伪造（CSRF）漏洞允许远端攻击者通过涉及Flash文件上传的载体劫持未指定的受害者的身份验证.

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2017/01/wordpress-4-7-1-security-and-maintenance-release/

Vulnerability.Description: 远端攻击者通过在4.7.1之前的WordPress的wp-includes/class-wp-theme.php中的主题名字回退功能中发现跨站脚本（XSS）漏洞,可以通过一个制作好的目录名称主题,与wp-admin/includes/class-theme-installer-skin.php相关.

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2017/01/wordpress-4-7-1-security-and-maintenance-release/

Vulnerability.Description: WordPress 4.7.1之前的wp-mail.php可能允许远端攻击者通过一个带有mail.example.com名字的欺骗邮件服务器来绕过想要的发布限制.

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2017/01/wordpress-4-7-1-security-and-maintenance-release/
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-5492: 小部件編輯的輔助功能模式下的跨站請求偽造（CSRF）
Vulnerability.Description: 在4.7.1之前的WordPress的widget-editing accessibility-mode功能中的跨站请求伪造（CSRF）漏洞允许远端攻击者劫持未指定的受害者对执行小部件访问操作的请求的身份验证,这些请求与wp-admin/includes/class-wp-screen.php和wp-admin/widgets.php.

Vulnerability.Description: wp-includes/ms-functions.php在4.7.1之前的WordPress的多站点WordPress API中没有正确选择随机数字,这使远端攻击者可以更容易地通过精心设计的（1）站点注册绕过预期的访问限制,或者 （2）用户注册.

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://github.com/WordPress/WordPress/commit/21264a31e0849e6ff793a06a17de877dd88ea454

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://github.com/WordPress/WordPress/commit/21264a31e0849e6ff793a06a17de877dd88ea454

Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-6816: 管理員使用插件刪除功能可以刪除無意的文件

Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-6819: 報刊中的跨站點請求偽造（CSRF）這導致服務器資源的過度使用

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2017/05/wordpress-4-7-5/

Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2017-9066: HTTP類中的重定向驗證不足,導致SSRF.
Vulnerability.Description: 在4.7.5之前的WordPress中,HTTP类没有足够的重定向验证,导致SSRF.

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商暂未发布修复措施解决此安全问题，建议使用此软件的用户随时关注厂商主页或参考网址以获取解决办法： https://wordpress.com/
Vulnerability.Description: WordPress version 4.9.8 and earlier contains a CWE-20 Input Validation vulnerability in thumbnail processing that can result in remote code execution due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2017-1000600. This attack appears to be exploitable via thumbnail upload by an authenticated user and may require additional plugins in order to be exploited however this has not been confirmed at this time.
Vulnerability.name: wordpress:cve-2018-1000773:输入验证不正确

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2018/04/wordpress-4-9-5-security-and-maintenance-release/
Vulnerability.Description: Before WordPress 4.9.5, the redirection URL for the login page was not validated or sanitized if forced to use HTTPS.
Vulnerability.name: wordpress:cve-2018-10100:url重定向到不受信任的站点（“open redirect”）。

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2018/04/wordpress-4-9-5-security-and-maintenance-release/
Vulnerability.Description: Before WordPress 4.9.5, the URL validator assumed URLs with the hostname localhost were on the same host as the WordPress server.
Vulnerability.name: wordpress:cve-2018-10101:url重定向到不受信任的站点（“open redirect”）。

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2018/04/wordpress-4-9-5-security-and-maintenance-release/
Vulnerability.Description: Before WordPress 4.9.5, the version string was not escaped in the get_the_generator function, and could lead to XSS in a generator tag.
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2018-10102: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商暂未发布修复措施解决此安全问题，建议使用此软件的用户随时关注厂商主页或参考网址以获取解决办法： https://wordpress.com/
Vulnerability.Description: WordPress through 4.9.6 allows Author users to execute arbitrary code by leveraging directory traversal in the wp-admin/post.php thumb parameter, which is passed to the PHP unlink function and can delete the wp-config.php file. This is related to missing filename validation in the wp-includes/post.php wp_delete_attachment function. The attacker must have capabilities for files and posts that are normally available only to the Author, Editor, and Administrator roles. The attack methodology is to delete wp-config.php and then launch a new installation process to increase the attacker's privileges.
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress:CVE-2018-12895:Wordpress经过身份验证的任意文件删除

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2018/12/wordpress-5-0-1-security-release/
Vulnerability.Description: In WordPress before 4.9.9 and 5.x before 5.0.1, authors could modify metadata to bypass intended restrictions on deleting files.
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress:CVE-2018-20147:访问控制不当

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2018/12/wordpress-5-0-1-security-release/
Vulnerability.Description: In WordPress before 4.9.9 and 5.x before 5.0.1, contributors could conduct PHP object injection attacks via crafted metadata in a wp.getMediaItem XMLRPC call. This is caused by mishandling of serialized data at phar:// URLs in the wp_get_attachment_thumb_file function in wp-includes/post.php.
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress:CVE-2018-20148:不受信任数据的反序列化

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2018/12/wordpress-5-0-1-security-release/
Vulnerability.Description: In WordPress before 4.9.9 and 5.x before 5.0.1, when the Apache HTTP Server is used, authors could upload crafted files that bypass intended MIME type restrictions, leading to XSS, as demonstrated by a .jpg file without JPEG data.
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2018-20149: 跨站脚本攻击

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2018/12/wordpress-5-0-1-security-release/
Vulnerability.Description: In WordPress before 4.9.9 and 5.x before 5.0.1, crafted URLs could trigger XSS for certain use cases involving plugins.
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2018-20150: 跨站脚本攻击

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2018/12/wordpress-5-0-1-security-release/
Vulnerability.Description: In WordPress before 4.9.9 and 5.x before 5.0.1, the user-activation page could be read by a search engine's web crawler if an unusual configuration were chosen. The search engine could then index and display a user's e-mail address and (rarely) the password that was generated by default.
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress:CVE-2018-20151:信息曝光

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2018/12/wordpress-5-0-1-security-release/
Vulnerability.Description: In WordPress before 4.9.9 and 5.x before 5.0.1, authors could bypass intended restrictions on post types via crafted input.
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress:CVE-2018-20152:输入验证不正确

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2018/12/wordpress-5-0-1-security-release/
Vulnerability.Description: In WordPress before 4.9.9 and 5.x before 5.0.1, contributors could modify new comments made by users with greater privileges, possibly causing XSS.
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2018-20153: 跨站脚本攻击

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2018/01/wordpress-4-9-2-security-and-maintenance-release/
Vulnerability.Description: WordPress before 4.9.2 has XSS in the Flash fallback files in MediaElement (under wp-includes/js/mediaelement).
Vulnerability.name: wordpress:cve-2018-5776：网页生成过程中输入的中和不当（“跨站点脚本”）。

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商暂未发布修复措施解决此安全问题，建议使用此软件的用户随时关注厂商主页或参考网址以获取解决办法： https://wordpress.org/
Vulnerability.Description: In WordPress through 4.9.2, unauthenticated attackers can cause a denial of service (resource consumption) by using the large list of registered .js files (from wp-includes/script-loader.php) to construct a series of requests to load every file many times.
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2018-6389: 不可控资源消耗 ('Resource Exhaustion')

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，详情请关注厂商主页： http://www.wordpress.org/
Vulnerability.Description: WordPress before 4.9.9 and 5.x before 5.0.1 allows remote code execution because an _wp_attached_file Post Meta entry can be changed to an arbitrary string, such as one ending with a .jpg?file.php substring. An attacker with author privileges can execute arbitrary code by uploading a crafted image containing PHP code in the Exif metadata. Exploitation can leverage CVE-2019-8943.
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress: CVE-2019-8942: 代码注入

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接： https://wordpress.org/news/2019/03/wordpress-5-1-1-security-and-maintenance-release/
Vulnerability.Description: WordPress before 5.1.1 does not properly filter comment content, leading to Remote Code Execution by unauthenticated users in a default configuration. This occurs because CSRF protection is mishandled, and because Search Engine Optimization of A elements is performed incorrectly, leading to XSS. The XSS results in administrative access, which allows arbitrary changes to .php files. This is related to wp-admin/includes/ajax-actions.php and wp-includes/comment.php.
Vulnerability.name: Wordpress:CVE-2019-9787:跨站请求伪造(CSRF)

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商还没有提供此漏洞的相关补丁或者升级程序，建议使用此软件的用户随时关注厂商的主页以获取最新版本： https://www.alice-dsl.de/
Vulnerability.name: Obsolete Version of WordPress
Vulnerability.Description: 在3.7之前的WordPress版本不会得到安全更新. 建议升级到最新的官方支持版本.
